info.description: Driving License (DL) and Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) of the State, as available on Parivahan Sewa (http://parivahan.co.in/) of Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, are available on DigiLocker. Citizens can pull these documents into their DigiLocker accounts.
info.title: Transport Department, Gujarat

DOB.description: Date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY format

format.description: The format of the certificate in response.

txnId.description: A unique transaction id for this request in UUID format. It is used for tracking the request.

application/pdf.example: Response body contains contents of the certificate in PDF format.

200.description: The certificate data in response body in PDF, XML or JSON format as requested in format parameter.

post.description: API to verify Registration of Vehicles.

reg_no.example: DL01AA0101 As per your Vehicle Registration Certificate

from.description: Date time format in UTC, includes miliseconds YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.vZ
